name: Bee-rista
description:
Step into the boots of a bee working in a hive's coffee shop. Meet customers, make coffee, and have a cozy day.

Game features volume controls, ability to skip tutorials, and an accessible font via Open Dyslexia.

WASD to move, mouse to interact.

Known Issues

  • In resolutions other than 1920 x 1080, the tamper game does not always register at the correct point. Therefore the game will attempt to force the resolution to 1920 x 1080.
